alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk and eastern Nassau Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Levittown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Levittown, Commack, Huntington Station, Centereach, Shirley, Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Plainview, Medford, Massapequa, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma and Syosset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
